accuracy_of_information.description: The correctness of the information provided in the final answer.

completeness_of_reasoning.description: The extent to which the agent has fully traced the steps needed to answer the question.

relevance_of_research.description: How on-topic the agent's research steps and gathered information are.

ability_to_adapt.description: The system's capability to shift strategies when initial attempts fail to provide results.

use_of_resources.description: The efficiency and effectiveness in using available resources (e.g., web searches, databases).

response_time.description: The amount of time taken by the agent to provide a satisfactory answer.

process_transparency.description: The clarity and detail provided about the steps taken and the reasoning process.

conformity_to_instructions.description: How closely the actions of the agent align with the instructions given.
